definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to trace over/to copy (a calligraphy model)/facsimile/(fig.) to depict/to portray
to trace over/to take a copy (of a calligraphy, a painting etc)/(fig.) to describe/to portray
variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
to copy (a model of calligraphy or painting etc)
to bear a close resemblance to/to be the very image of
line drawing in traditional ink and brush style/simple and straightforward style of writing
gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to copy (a model of calligraphy or painting)
to write freely/to express oneself as one pleases
